name: Piano Penguim
description:
Piano Penguim is a nice fellow. 

He always wanted to be like the other animals... Until one day, he found himself lost in a strange world, where everything seems hazardous and perilous things happen to come over to him all the time!

Now he must overcome all the ever increasing obstacles, in 40 levels, to be able to find his way again. Will you help him on his journey in record time?
